headline: Lennox Declares Quarterly Dividend and Announces Annual Meeting
summary: The board of directors of Lennox (NYSE: LII) voted to declare a quarterly cash dividend of $1.15 per share of common stock. The dividend is payable on January 15, 2025, to stockholders of record as of December 31, 2024.
